mapper.select: SELECT p.post_id , p.title , p.content , p.like_count , p.written_datetime , p.together , e.emotion_name , u.nickname , c.companion_type , t.theme_name FROM POST p LEFT JOIN USER u ON p.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN MISSION m ON p.mission_id = m.mission_id LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT a ON p.post_id = a.post_id LEFT JOIN COMPANION c ON p.companion_id = c.companion_id LEFT JOIN EMOTION e ON p.emotion_id = e.emotion_id LEFT JOIN THEME t ON (m.pri_theme_id = t.theme_id OR m.sub_theme_id = t.theme_id) WHERE u.user_id = 1;

SELECT u.user_id , u.email , u.password , u.birthday , u.nickname , u.gender , u.signup_date , a.src_url as srcUrl FROM USER u LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE u.user_id = 1 AND a.type = 'profile';
